Write-Up Text: In these posts people are discussing the Australian Federal Budget and its impact on different aspects of life including housing mental health and students. While some celebrate healthcare measures cost-of-living support and scholarships others express concerns about the lack of direct support for university students and mental health carers. Among other things the budget proposes rent relief eco-upgrade grants low deposit loans measures to tackle invasive species and support for homeless people. The tone ranges from celebratory and informative to critical and skeptical but all the posts contribute to a conversation on current affairs.
